```{r, echo=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)
require(GGally)

ALLTHEFILES <- dir("../../AssemStat/")

File_Num <- length(ALLTHEFILES)

ALLTHESTATS <- read.csv(paste("../../AssemStat/", ALLTHEFILES[1], sep=""), sep = "\t")

for (X in c(2:File_Num)){
  ALLTHESTATS <- rbind(ALLTHESTATS, 
                       read.csv( paste("../../AssemStat/", ALLTHEFILES[X], sep=""), sep = "\t"))}

ALLTHESTATS$K <- rep(seq(49, 73, by=2), times = 1, each=3)

ALLTHESTATS$color <- rep(paste("k",seq(49, 73, by=2),sep="_"), times = 1, each=3)



```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

Unitigs <- dplyr::slice(ALLTHESTATS, c(seq(1, 21, by= 3)))
Contigs <- dplyr::slice(ALLTHESTATS, c(seq(2, 21, by= 3)))
Scaffolds <- dplyr::slice(ALLTHESTATS, c(seq(3, 21, by= 3)))

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

ggpairs( Contigs, columns = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 6), aes(col=color, alpha=.75))

plot(Contigs$N50, Contigs$L50)

```
